body:
Looks like the one in distributions/special_math.py currently isn't exported to public API.
Since it is useful, makes sense to add tf_export decorator to it, but I don't know about its implementation.

Looks like Eugene approved PR that added erfinv to special_math.py. @ebrevdo Eugene, can you take a look at the difference between 2 erfinv implementations and whether it makes sense to add the one in special_math.py to public API?

body_text:
Looks like the one in distributions/special_math.py currently isn't exported to public API.
Since it is useful, makes sense to add tf_export decorator to it, but I don't know about its implementation.
Looks like Eugene approved PR that added erfinv to special_math.py. @ebrevdo Eugene, can you take a look at the difference between 2 erfinv implementations and whether it makes sense to add the one in special_math.py to public API?
